title: English as a Second Language Assessment and Digital Technology Integration Training for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English communication skills and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: A practical-oriented curriculum applying digital assessment tools and blended classroom techniques in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can interpret core English expressions used in international academic papers/reports in science fields with 85% accuracy
Learners can systematically organize their language proficiency diagnostic results using digital portfolio tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Sites)
Learners can correct grammatical errors in scientific English documents with 90%+ accuracy using AI-based assessment systems (e.g., Grammarly, Turnitin)

resources: Science Domain English Assessment Item Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
